title: U.S. accuses China of secretive nuclear test as arms-control agreements lapse
summary_full: Top U.S. nuclear official accuses China of conducting a secret nuclear test in 2020 and confirms plans to restart U.S. nuclear testing, citing a need to match covert detonations by Beijing and Moscow.
summary_public: Top U.S. nuclear official accuses China of conducting a secret nuclear test in 2020 and confirms plans to restart U.S. nuclear testing, citing a need to match covert detonations by Beijing and Moscow.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: covert detonations by Beijing and Moscow.
